Name: Phantasmal Clone Talisman
Desc:
[Talisman Magic] Transforms a talisman into a clone and attacks the enemy from all sides. Summons a clone that attacks surrounding enemies when you attack.
Installation skills or attacks by summoners don't summon the clone.Phantasmal Clone Talisman does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status and prioritizes the Boss monster with the highest Max HP.

Desc.Old:
[Talisman Magic] Transforms a talisman into a clone and attacks the enemy from all sides. Summons a clone that attacks surrounding enemies when you attack.
Installation skills or attacks by summoners do not summon the clone.

Phantasmal Clone Talisman does not trigger returning damage from enemies with Damage Reflection and prioritizes tracking Boss monsters with the highest Max HP.
Desc.New:
[Talisman Magic] Transforms a talisman into a clone and attacks the enemy from all sides. Summons a clone that attacks surrounding enemies when you attack.
Installation skills or attacks by summoners don't summon the clone.Phantasmal Clone Talisman does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status and prioritizes the Boss monster with the highest Max HP.

H.Old:
Talisman Power cost: 100. Summons 3 clones when you attack for 200 sec. Each clone attacks 4 times at 60% damage. +20% damage to normal monsters.
Clones can't be summoned for 1.5 sec. after being summoned once.
H.New:
Talisman Power Cost: 100. Summons 3 clones when you attack for 200 sec.
Each clone attacks at 60% Damage 4 times. Normal Monster Damage +20%.
Clones can't be re-summoned for 1.5 sec.
